feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: Pray sit down,” said Dorothea, crossing her hands on her lap; “I am very glad you were here.”

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: As Mrs. Kell closed the door behind her they met: each was looking at the other, and consciousness was overflowed by something that suppressed utterance.

feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: The tears came and rolled down her cheeks, but she did not know it. The world, it seemed, was turning ugly and hateful, and there was no place for her trustfulness.

takePlaceAt.name: Carriage passing under the archway of the lodge-gate at the Grange

feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: Her face was flushed and her lip trembled.

causedByEvent.name: Feeling angry at the injustice towards Will Ladislaw

takePlaceAt.name: Carriage passing under the archway of the lodge-gate at the Grange

feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: Pray sit down,” said Dorothea, crossing her hands on her lap; “I am very glad you were here.”

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: As Mrs. Kell closed the door behind her they met: each was looking at the other, and consciousness was overflowed by something that suppressed utterance.

feels.name: Indignation
feels.quote: I have been grossly insulted in your eyes and in the eyes of others. There has been a mean implication against my character.
